== Introduction ==
If you unintentionally installed Kubuntu in the wrong language, you can follow this guide to install your preferred language.

== Install A Language ==

1. Open the '''KDE''' menu.

2. Choose '''System settings'''

3. Open '''Regional and language'''

4. Click the '''Install New Language''' button.

5. Type in your password.

6. Click the '''OK''' button.

7. Choose the language you wish to install.

8. Click the '''Install''' button.

== Add The Newly Installed Language ==

1. Click the '''Add Language''' button.

2. Choose '''Other'''.

3. Choose the language you installed.

== Remove A Language ==

1. Select the language you wish to remove.

2. Click the '''Uninstall Language''' button.
